main event: A visual observation of an object that appeared to explode in the sky, possibly a meteor.
interesting points: The initial flash attracted the observer's attention., The object seemed to follow a southerly trajectory., The observation lasted for a few seconds., The report speculated that the object could be a balloon, meteor, aircraft, or something unknown., The sighting occurred at 09:0324Z on November 3, 1955.
sighted object: an object that appeared to explode
witness description: O/S observation based on visual report
